verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I've been redeemed. I've been redeemed.
I've been redeemed. I've been redeemed.
I've been washed in the blood of the Lamb,
I've been washed in the blood of the Lamb,
I've been washed in the blood of the Lamb,
That flows from Calvary.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I've been set free. (4x)
I've been purged in the fire of His love, (3x)
That burns away my flesh.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
I've been transformed. (4x)
And I'm changed to the image of His Son, (3x)
As Christ comes forth in me.
